initial_contact.subject: Exciting {job_title} Opportunity at {company_name}

follow_up.subject: Following up on {job_title} opportunity
follow_up.body:
Hi {candidate_name},

I wanted to follow up on the {job_title} position I shared with you last week.

This role is still available and I believe your skills in {top_skills} make you an ideal candidate. The hiring manager is actively reviewing profiles and I'd hate for you to miss this opportunity.

Are you available for a quick 15-minute call this week to discuss?

Best regards,
{recruiter_name}

rejection_soft.subject: Thank you for your interest in {job_title}
rejection_soft.body:
Hi {candidate_name},

Thank you for your interest in the {job_title} position at {company_name}.

While we've decided to move forward with other candidates for this particular role, I was impressed by your background in {top_skills}.

I'd love to keep your profile on file for future opportunities that might be a better fit. Would you be open to me reaching out when relevant positions become available?

Best regards,
{recruiter_name}
